title: Amazon Seeks FCC Extension of Satellite Deadline, Lacks Rockets
description: Amazon.com Inc. asked the Federal Communications Commission for more time to meet a regulatory deadline to have more than 1,600 internet satellites in orbit by mid-2026, citing a shortage of rockets to launch them.

title: Peloton Cuts 11% of Jobs, With Engineering Teams Getting Hit
description: Peloton Interactive Inc., the long-struggling fitness technology company, slashed 11% of its workforce in a cost-cutting move, according to a person with knowledge of the matter.
